items.title: ‘The pint is safe with us’: Under threat from a change to metric, British Lords vote to safeguard the cherished measure
items.description: 'The pint is safe with us': Under threat of metrication, British Lords pass legal safeguard for the pint of beer

items.title: Trump’s team promised governments would ‘eat’ its tariffs. Execs say they’re passing on at least 50% to consumers

items.title: Elon Musk’s offer to bring home stranded astronauts never reached the space station, say NASA astronauts who are still in orbit after 9 months
items.description: Musk said the astronauts could’ve been rescued sooner but the Biden administration rejected his assistance.

items.title: Utah becomes first state to pass legislation requiring app stores to verify user ages and get parental consent for minors
items.description: The bill has pitted Meta against app store giants Apple and Google over who should be responsible for verifying ages.

items.title: Trump asks farmers and consumers to ‘bear with me’ as they brace for unpredictable tariff hit to their wallets
